00052 // 64-bit int
00053 #define OSCL_NATIVE_INT64_TYPE     int64_t
00054 #define OSCL_NATIVE_UINT64_TYPE    uint64_t
00055 #define INT64(x) x##LL
00056 #define UINT64(x) x##ULL
00057 #define INT64_HILO(high,low) ((((high##LL))<<32)|low)
00058 #define UINT64_HILO(high,low) ((((high##ULL))<<32)|low)
00059 
00060 // character set.
00061 #define OSCL_HAS_UNICODE_SUPPORT            1
00062 #define OSCL_NATIVE_WCHAR_TYPE wchar_t
00063 #if (OSCL_HAS_UNICODE_SUPPORT)
00064 #define _STRLIT(x) L ## x
00065 #else
00066 #define _STRLIT(x) x
00067 #endif
00068 #define _STRLIT_CHAR(x) x
00069 #define _STRLIT_WCHAR(x) L ## x
00070 
00071 // Thread-local storage.  Unix has keyed TLS.
00072 #define OSCL_HAS_TLS_SUPPORT    1
00073 #define OSCL_TLS_IS_KEYED 1
00074 typedef pthread_key_t TOsclTlsKey ;
00075 #define OSCL_TLS_KEY_CREATE_FUNC(key) (pthread_key_create(&key,NULL)==0)
00076 #define OSCL_TLS_KEY_DELETE_FUNC(key) pthread_key_delete(key)
00077 #define OSCL_TLS_STORE_FUNC(key,ptr) (pthread_setspecific(key,(const void*)ptr)==0)
00078 #define OSCL_TLS_GET_FUNC(key) pthread_getspecific(key)
00079 
00080 //Basic lock

00082 #include <pthread.h>
00083 typedef pthread_mutex_t TOsclBasicLockObject;
